name: Commercial Legal Manager
description:
Due to fast business growth, we are looking for an experienced Commercial Legal Manager. The role will be assigned to the Finance & Commercial team but with clear target to provide business-related legal support and advice to everyone in the organization. The candidate is expected to be a team-player with a can-do attitude and an ability to 'think outside the box'.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Draft, review and negotiate a wide variety of commercial contracts, frame agreements and other contractual terms in collaboration with relevant stakeholders
  • Effective day-to-day management of contracts, including customer/supplier liaison and relationship management on contractual matters
  • Proactively identify legal risks to the business and assist in developing strategies and internal documents to mitigate all kinds of risks
  • Perform claim management with customers and suppliers
  • Resolution of disputes and claims ensuring best outcome for the company
  • Provide professional advice and guidance to colleagues at all levels of seniority, building a reputation as a reliable source of legal support
  • Communicate and negotiate with external parties (customers, regulators, external counsel, public authority, etc.), solving various issues and creating relations of trust
  • Deal with, and advise on, day to day data protection and compliance topics
  • Ownership of contract and document management including archiving, standard contracts (and templates), and library
  • Provide training on legal and compliance matters to non-legal functions
Requirements:
  • Master’s in commercial law, with additional training in finance
  • At least 6 years’ experience in a similar role in commercial legal department, ideally in industrial projects in the plant engineering industry or similar industries with international exposure
  • Profound legal knowledge and commercial awareness
  • Proficient in English
  • Very good negotiation and communication skills with cross-cultural competences, down-to-earth character, assertive with a diplomatic flair who is able to engage and build relationships with colleagues and partners within the business
  • Efficient and pragmatic working style, proactive, goal-oriented and solution-driven (can do attitude), entrepreneurial approach
  • Very good problem-solving skills, ability to consider complex interdependent aspects of problems including working without established precedent or procedure
  • Ability to manage multiple projects at any one time
Benefits:
  • International and successful company with sustainable prospects for the future
  • Wide technical & modern environment with interesting challenges
  • Professional environment with an open communication culture
  • Exciting development and training opportunities
  • Great and dynamic work environment
